title: PVP.net Patch Kernel
body: I was just able to play yesterday, and this morning, I get this pop-up that says: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling but I still get the same notification. This happened on my other computer as well. Both systems are windows, although one is Windows 10 and the other is Windows 7; I believe. I'm at a loss on what to do about it.

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors usually indicate that there's an issue with League's permissions and it doesn't have all the rights it needs to function properly. Working to [configure your system permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for League should resolve this in a jiffy!

Let me know if it did.
